snippet: The N.H.L. and the players union met for the first time since a hard-line offer was presented to the players on Friday.
abstract: NHL and the players union have their first negotiating session since a hard-line offer was presented to the players; offer surprised many for its tough stance, especially a proposal to drastically cut the players’ split of league revenue, from 57 percent to 46 percent.
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. and the players union met for the first time since a hard-line offer was presented to the players on Friday.

headline.seo: With Lockout in Background, Calm at N.H.L. Bargaining Talks
headline.main: With Lockout in Background, Calm Prevails at N.H.L. Talks
headline.print_headline: Quiet Day at N.H.L. Labor Talks
